alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Custer; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 10:11PM CDT until May 29 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Loup County in north central Nebraska... Southeastern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northern Custer County in central Nebraska... Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1011 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Elsmere to 6 miles south of Brewster to 7 miles northeast of Arnold, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taylor, Brewster, Sargent, Merna, Anselmo, Dunning, Comstock, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Fox Bayou, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Walworth, Hawley Flats, Kent Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Koshopah, Nunda Shoal Campground and Round Valley. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 107 and 149. Highway 2 between mile markers 234 and 269. Highway 92 between mile markers 254 and 271. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and north central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for central and north central Nebraska.
